description.translate:
The Ruler of the $(b;spring)Spring Court$() is $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$(), a young and charismatic fey. 
 He and $(b;summer)Queen Titania$() are lovers for a reason you know -The pixie winks at you - 
 Before we enter his land, we may want to prepare a offering. 
 What do you think sweetie? I know Prince Oberon on occasion enjoys a juicy $(b;spring)Roast Chicken$()! 
 Easy enough to make! When you are done $(b;spring)gift$() it to me.

description.text:
Wonderful! I'll make sure $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$() receives our offering!

$(b;spring)-Prince Oberon was pleased with your offering, he and the Autumn Pixie exchanged recipes. You received a wonderfully prepared roasted mutton chops from Prince Oberon as token of appreciation.-$()
